TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version older than 2.0.43

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]It's possible to view the source code of CGI scripts via a POST request made to a directory where WebDAV and CGI are enabled.[break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 2.0.42).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
